title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Striking a moderate tone on a sensitive matter with a person close to you could be a source of struggle today. One moment, youre seething while you recount and reflect on every nuance of an offensive statement. But another time, youre inclined to play it cool and not give anyone the satisfaction that youre affected by their words. Somewhere between these two extremes you can find the truth. Face the fact that someone has gotten under your skin but focus more on the fault than the fault-maker. You might discover that youre coping with the residue of a deeper issue only you can resolve. A friends eye is a good mirror. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
